headline: Today Is the Best Day to Buy Stocks. History Proves It.
summary: Investors looking for an edge on markets heading into the final weeks of the year might want to act quickly, according to Renaissance Macro Research, because today is the best day of the year to buy stocks.  Jeff deGraaf, the head of technical research, notes that Oct. 23 is “historically the best day to buy stocks for a three-month holding period”, with quarter-ahead returns of around 3.5% based on data compiled since 1928.  “It’s not just  ” deGraaf said in a note published Thursday.
